#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
#include <cmath>
#include <string.h>
using namespace std;



int main(){
	char foo[20005];
	cin>>foo;
	int n = strlen(foo);
	int s[n];
	for(int i=0; i<n; i++){
		s[i] =  foo[i]-'0';
	}
	int q;
	cin>>q;
	while(q--){
		int l,m;
		cin>>m>>l;
		int dp[2][m];
		for(int i=0; i<2; i++){
			for(int j=0; j<m; j++)dp[i][j] = 0;
		}
		int count = 0;
		dp[0][s[0]%m]++;
		count = count + dp[0][l];
		int c=1;
		for(int i=1; i<n; i++){
			for(int j=0; j<m; j++)dp[c][j] = 0;
			dp[c][s[i]%m]++;
			for(int j=0; j<m; j++){
				dp[c][(j*10+s[i])%m] = dp[c][(j*10+s[i])%m] + dp[1-c][j];
			}
			count = count + dp[c][l];
			c=1-c;
		}
		cout<<count<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
